name: Kleptos from Outer Space
description: Kleptos from Outer Space is a 3D On-Rails Co-op Typing Shooter, set on the GMU campus. One night a pair of best buds at George Mason University get their final capstone papers, which they need to graduate, stolen. As they search for their papers they notice something strange is going on around campus. Aliens have invaded the campus and are gathering objects for unknown reasons. It's up to you and your buddy to stop the alien threat and recover all that was stolen.  Players will have to survive through waves of aliens using the best weapon at their disposal, typing. The game features a 1950s space race era movie aesthetic with a campy style of humor. Grab your keyboard and prepare to fight the alien menace, so you can graduate on time and not have to go more in debt.
